Keywords: Animal , Celebrity , Detective , Mystery Inc.
Real Name: Scrappy-Doo
Special Powers
LET ME AT 'EM: SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a friendly character with a shared keyword of 60 points or less is KO'd, after resolutions you may generate Scrappy-Doo from your Sideline on click #3 in that character's square. If the KO'd character had the Mystery Inc. keyword, you may generate Scrappy-Doo on click #1 instead.
FLIM-FLAM'S SCAMS AND VAN GHOUL'S ADVICE: When Scrappy-Doo hits, choose one to last until your next turn:
*Hit characters can't be given FREE actions
*Hit characters gain Immobile
FEARLESS PUP: Toughness. // Scrappy-Doo takes a maximum of 1 damage from characters with the Monster or Mystical keyword. Protected: Outwit.
EXPERIMENTAL GOGGLES: Close Combat Expert, Outwit.

January 13, 2023
hoojeebo
25 points for top-dial Outwit alone is worth it. The fact that he's a deadly secondary attacker too is even more amazing. So even that would be more than worth the points, but THEN he also gets to choose between 2 great options when he hits. AND he's Tiny!
January 13, 2023
No-Name
Even without any of the bells and whistles, a figure that can reliably deal 4 damage on every single click for only 25 points is an insane value. That he also can be dropped in for free after one of his friends is KO'd, meaning that more or less every Scooby-Doo character potentially has 25 extra points built in for free? This thing is bonkers.
